historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 15-913.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 15-105, in subsecs. (a) and (b), substituted "this chapter" for "this act".

D.C. Law 15-354, in subsecs. (a) and (b), substituted "this chapter" for "this subchapter".

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 15-901.

For Law 15-105, see notes following § 15-901.

For Law 15-354, see notes following § 15-901.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 2 of the Uniform Foreign-Money Claims Act. See 13 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.

DC CODE § 15-913

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: This chapter applies only to a foreign-money claim in an action or distribution proceeding.
This chapter applies to foreign money issues even if other law, under the conflict of laws rules of the District of Columbia, applies to other issues in the action or distribution proceeding.

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)
